Package xyz.controllers

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    AdminController
    Admin Controller represents the main controller dashboard and provides access to internal model routes for the purposes of the application.
    BaseController
    BaseController contains the core controller functionality all other controllers should inherit from this class.
    GroupController
    Group controller manages group endpoint calls for managing group objects within the framework
    IndexController
    Index controller handles the public facing index page site prior to user configuration
    ModelsController
    General Model CRUD Controller Endpoint.
    PageController
    Page controller provides basic page functionality but most page logic is handled by its owner the site.
    RouteManager
    The type Route manager.
    SiteController
    Site Controller Manages Sites and their associated pages and stores in the framework filesystem.
    ThemeController
    Themes controller class manages themes in its resources/web/themes filesystem
    UserController
    The type User controller.
